title: Brutal selloff! Gold, silver prices crash in volatile session - what‚Äôs causing the dip?
content: After an exhilarating rally in the recent sessions, gold and silver futures took a nosedive on Friday as traders took the opportunity to cash in on their gains. The drop, spurred by a robust US dollar and shifting global market sentiments, led to notable declines across both domestic and international exchanges.

title: 'Whitewashing brutal invasions': BJP flays Cong over ex-VP Ansari calling Ghazni 'Indian'
content: BJP storngly condemned former Vice President Hamid Ansari for his remarks who called Mahmud Ghazni as an Indian. In a social media post, BJP spokesperson C Kesavan said that the remarks were ‚Äúshocking‚Äù and recalled that Ansari had been the Congress-led UPA‚Äôs choice for Vice President twice. Shehzad Poonawala, also attacked the Congress party.

title: 'Menstrual health a Fundamental Right': SC makes landmark ruling - 3 key orders explained
content: The Supreme Court has declared menstrual hygiene a constitutional right under Article 21, mandating free sanitary pads and separate toilets for girls in all schools. This ruling ensures dignity and equality, holding both government and private institutions accountable for compliance. The judgment stems from concerns over "period-shaming" incidents.

title: India's coach offered to resign after senior player's exclusion over 'indiscipline'
content: Chief coach Craig Fulton reportedly threatened to resign over Manpreet Singh's exclusion from core hockey probables on disciplinary grounds, viewing it as "external interference." Fulton advocated for the veteran midfielder's inclusion, citing his fitness and mentorship role. Hockey India officials, however, maintained Manpreet sought rest, leading to his omission.

title: 'From 0 to 64 lakh': Shah attacks Cong over infiltrators in poll-bound Assam
content: Union home minister Amit Shah accused the Congress of altering Assam's demography, claiming infiltrator numbers rose significantly during their rule. He urged voters to elect the BJP for a third term to combat infiltration and protect the state's identity, highlighting the Mising community's role in this effort.

title: Amazon HR head's 'message' for employees on layoffs: As we always have, every team will‚Ä¶
content: Amazon HR chief Beth Galetti told employees the company won't announce mass layoffs every few months‚Äîthough individual teams will keep making staffing "adjustments as appropriate." The careful wording follows 16,000 job cuts earlier this week and 14,000 in October last year. Company's top leadership framed the job cuts as part of CEO Andy Jassy's push to operate like the "world's largest startup," suggesting ongoing changes despite promises of no regular cuts.

title: ‚ÄòPakistani-yo ki choti choti khushiya‚Äô: Jadeja's sharp dig at Pakistan PM's X post
content: Former cricketer Ajay Jadeja sparked a debate by criticising Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif's celebratory tweet after Pakistan's T20I win against Australia. Jadeja's remark highlighted the perceived over-celebration of a bilateral series opener.

title: 'Border 2' vs 'Mardaani 3': Sunny Deol film faces competition from Rani Mukerji starrer
content: 'Border 2' has had a strong box office run, crossing Rs 200 crore thanks to its Republic Day release. Despite an initial surge, the film saw a significant drop in numbers, further impacted by the release of 'Mardaani 3'. 'Border 2' has now collected a total of Rs 225.36 crore.

title: 'Angoor khate hai': Goyal rips into 'negative mindset' of Cong; pans UPA-era FTA deals
content: Union minister Piyush Goyal defended the India-EU FTA, dismissing Congress criticism as 'sour grapes' and highlighting the party's past inaction. He accused Congress of endangering India's interests by pushing for China-centric trade pacts, contrasting it with the current government's balanced approach. Goyal also lauded India's economic growth and the FTA's geopolitical significance.

title: Microsoft loses $400 billion in hours: What triggered the stock plunge
content: Microsoft shares plummeted, wiping out over $400 billion in market value, its worst day since March 2020. Investors are concerned about the company's massive AI spending, a slowdown in its cloud segment, and OpenAI's financial stability.  Despite high demand, capacity constraints are impacting Azure's growth, leading to calls for a stock revaluation.

title: Kuwait-Delhi flight carrying 180 passengers diverted to Ahmedabad following bomb threat
content: An IndiGo flight from Kuwait to Delhi was diverted to Ahmedabad this morning after a bomb threat. The aircraft landed safely with 180 passengers. A handwritten note claiming a bomb was on board prompted the diversion. All passengers were evacuated safely. Security personnel conducted a thorough search. No suspicious objects were found.

title: Budget 2026: Press meets, reels & more ‚Äî BJP rolls out nationwide 'Outreach Campaign'
content: The BJP is launching a nationwide outreach campaign from February 1-15 to explain the Union Budget 2026, utilizing both traditional and digital outreach. Ministers and leaders will address press conferences at nearly 150 locations. Meanwhile, MDMK leader Vaiko has accused the BJP government of discriminating against Tamil Nadu and attempting to impose Hindi, vowing strong resistance.

title: Google founder Larry Page shares his 'work principle': Doing things that wouldn‚Äôt ...
content: Google founder Larry Page champions a "10x" philosophy, advocating for ambitious breakthroughs over incremental improvements. This approach emphasizes tackling problems from the ground up and exploring what technology can make possible, leading to significant impact.  Page's vision drove innovations like Gmail's vast storage and the creation of Google X for moonshot projects.

title: Jail terms & seclusion: How Pakistan has perfected the art of silencing dissent
content: Pakistan intensifies legal actions against Imran Khan and activists, citing national security. Critics fear shrinking democratic space amid military influence, as prison visits are restricted and lawyers face lengthy sentences for alleged anti-state content. Officials maintain these are lawful measures against destabilization, not dissent suppression.

title: Thierry Henry and Andrea Rajacic net worth, wealth and love story
content: Thierry Henry became a football legend with clubs like Arsenal and Barcelona, then stayed in the game as a coach and TV expert. By early 2026, his net worth is estimated around $125‚Äì135 million. His long-time partner Andrea Rajacic, who works in fashion, has her own income. Together, they share a quiet family life and a combin

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $35M Cubs star as Robert Suarez emerges key asset
content: A hypothetical trade sees the Atlanta Braves acquiring versatile infielder Nico Hoerner from the Chicago Cubs for hard-throwing reliever Robert Suarez. This move addresses Atlanta's infield void due to injury, while Chicago secures a much-needed closer. Both players are in their prime with multi-year control, making it a balanced, win-now exchange.

title: 'I needed to let him go': Gabrielle Union on almost ending marriage with Dwyane Wade
content: Dwyane Wade and his wife, the popular actress Gabrielle Union, have had a beautiful and a healthy marriage ever since they tied the knot in 2014.While things have always been good between them, Gabrielle Union went through a traumatic struggles as she tried to conceive their baby early on in their marriage. Unfortunately, the popular actress went through a number of miscarriages and had to opt for surrogacy later. While the miscarriages affected her health, Gabrielle Union opened up how it changed her relationship with Dwyane Wade.

title: 'Only 50-over is the real one': Manjrekar questions T20 World Cup's credibility
content: As the T20 World Cup approaches, former India batter Sanjay Manjrekar argues it shouldn't hold the same prestige as the 50-over World Cup. He believes the original four-year cycle of the ODI event grants it a unique legacy, a sentiment echoed by Rohit Sharma's deep reverence for the 50-over format.

title: 'Strong voice against communalism': Tharoor praises Rahul; what he said on differences with party
content: Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor has dismissed speculation of a rift within the party, projecting unity after meeting with Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge. The MP affirmed his commitment to the party and stated he would not leave, emphasising his intention to campaign extensively in Kerala for the upcoming assembly polls.

title: Woman elopes with lover 3 months after wedding; husband, her brother-in-law die by suicide
content: A newlywed man died by suicide after his wife eloped with her lover. The woman's brother-in-law also took his life upon learning of the incident. A suicide note from the first victim alleged false accusations and threats from his wife's family.

title: Tony Stewart‚Äôs Daytona comeback faces unexpected heat from Jimmie Johnson‚Äôs cup
content: The Cup Series‚Äô Daytona 500 is the most anticipated NASCAR race of the year. But with drivers like Tony Stewart stepping in, the Truck Series seems to be leaving a bigger impression. John Hunter Nemechek has recorded a few top-10 finishes with Legacy Motor Club over the past two years.  "I‚Äôm looking forward to making the most of this opportunity and having a strong run with the support of HFR and DriveValue.com.‚Äù

title: Asian Shooting C'ships | ‚ÄòPlaying in Delhi has its challenges‚Äô: Sangwan chases ‚Äòmissing‚Äô gold
content: Rhythm Sangwan, a 22-year-old shooter, acknowledged the pressure of competing at home in the upcoming Asian Rifle and Pistol Shooting Championship in New Delhi. Despite winning three medals in 2024, an Asian Championship gold remains elusive. Sangwan emphasised on focusing on her process rather than past results or future medal forecasts.

title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz S-Class luxury sedan revealed: Seven screens, V8 and more!
content: In addition to the standard S-Class, Mercedes-Benz will also offer AMG and AMG Line Plus trims with sportier styling elements, along with the armoured Mercedes-Benz S 680 GUARD 4MATIC. The GUARD 4MATIC uses the brand‚Äôs in-house Integrated Protection System (iSS), which combines a purpose-built protective cell with a discreet aluminium exterior, along with a reworked chassis. This setup enables the vehicle to meet VR10 standards, the highest level of civilian ballistic protection.

title: Karnataka Congress video hails ‚Äòbrand DK Shivakumar‚Äô as power tussle with Siddaramaiah simmers
content: Amidst Karnataka's Congress power tussle, the party highlighted Deputy CM D.K. Shivakumar with a social media video, calling him a "brand." This follows an incident where CM Siddaramaiah expressed irritation over pro-Shivakumar slogans at a rally, underscoring ongoing internal friction despite assurances of party high command's decisions.

title: ‚ÄòHe made me hear my sister‚Äôs screams‚Äô: Disturbing details emerge in pregnant SWAT commando murder
content: A pregnant Delhi Police SWAT commando, Kajal Chaudhary, tragically died after a brutal attack by her husband, Ankur. Her brother recounted a chilling final call where Ankur confessed to the assault. The family alleges prolonged dowry harassment and abuse, even during Kajal's pregnancy, citing significant financial demands and domestic disputes as potential motives for the fatal incident.

title: ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt disturb Chetta!‚Äô: Surya‚Äôs airport banter with Sanju Samson - watch
content: Captain Suryakumar Yadav playfully cleared the way for hometown hero Sanju Samson at the Thiruvananthapuram airport, highlighting Samson's special connection with Kerala.  With Samson facing selection pressure due to recent form, this low-stakes T20I offers a chance for him to regain confidence amidst overwhelming home support before the World Cup.

title: Kolkata fire tragedy: Manager, deputy manager of Wow! Momo arrested; 25 bodies recovered so far
content: Two managers of Wow! Momo have been arrested after a devastating fire in South 24 Parganas killed at least 25 workers and left 27 missing. The blaze, which started in a decorator's godown, rapidly spread to an adjoining Wow! Momo warehouse, trapping workers who lived on the premises.

title: Eco Survey draws on Yama‚Äôs message on delayed gratification - will Budget 2026 take cues?
content: The Economic Survey clearly underscores the critical role that manufacturing and exports will continue to play in driving India‚Äôs growth, especially at a time when the global economy is increasingly fragmented and marked by heightened tensions.

title: Indonesian couple caned 140 times for breaking this Sharia law
content: In a stark display of Aceh's strict Sharia law, a couple endured 140 public canings each for extramarital sex and alcohol consumption. This severe punishment, witnessed by many, underscores the province's conservative Islamic regulations.  Even a Sharia police officer faced lashes for a similar offense, highlighting the unwavering enforcement of these codes.

title: The trouble with definitions: Why the SC halted UGC‚Äôs equity framework
content: The Supreme Court has put the UGC‚Äôs 2026 equity regulations on hold and revived the 2012 framework, flagging concerns that the new rules could create unequal access to grievance redressal. At the centre is Regulation 3(c), which defines ‚Äúcaste-based discrimination‚Äù only for SC/ST/OBC complainants. The case now tests how universities balance targeted protection with constitutional equality in remedies.

title: Salman Ali Agha confirms T20 WC role as Pakistan participation decision looms
content: Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha has confirmed he will bat at number three for the upcoming ICC Men's T20 World Cup, aiming to dominate spin during the Powerplay. This strategic move, already tested in a recent win against Australia, signals a clear on-field plan despite ongoing off-field uncertainties regarding the team's participation.

title: ‚ÄòLow risk, travel curbs not needed‚Äô: WHO assesses Nipah virus cases in India
content: The World Health Organisation has reassured the public about India's latest Nipah virus outbreak, stating the risk of spread remains low and no travel restrictions are needed. Two nurses in West Bengal tested positive, but extensive contact tracing found no further cases. The WHO considers national, regional, and global risks low, though sub-national risk in West Bengal is moderate.

title: Was Ajit Pawar considering an NCP merger before his death? What aides say
content: Ajit Pawar was reportedly close to merging the two NCP factions before his sudden death. His demise has created a political vacuum in Maharashtra. The future of the Nationalist Congress Party now hangs in the balance. Talks of a reunion were ongoing, but his absence complicates the process. The Pawar family faces crucial decisions regarding the party's future direction.

title: Stars dropped for indiscipline? Manpreet, Dilpreet miss India's Pro League probables
content: Veteran hockey star Manpreet Singh and two others were dropped from the FIH Pro League probables due to disciplinary issues during the South Africa tour. Sources revealed a serious incident involving a banned substance led to their exclusion. This marks a significant omission for the experienced player ahead of a crucial season.

title: I was misquoted, edited clips circulated by ‚Äòcertain IT cell‚Äô: Wangchuk to SC
content: Climate activist Sonam Wangchuk's detention under the NSA is challenged in the Supreme Court. His lawyer argues that edited videos and misquoted statements, circulated by an "IT cell," were wrongly used for his arrest. Wangchuk's wife contends he never made anti-national remarks, only criticized government policies regarding Ladakh's environmental protection and promised safeguards.

title: 'Is call ko recording pe rakh': Chilling call before husband killed pregnant SWAT commando
content: A 27-year-old pregnant Delhi Police SWAT commando, Kajal Chaudhary, died after a brutal assault at her home. Her brother recounted hearing her screams during a phone call with her husband, Ankur, who allegedly confessed to the attack. The family alleges prolonged torture and dowry harassment, leading to Kajal's death.

title: What Indian officials gifted US counterparts in 2024: Silver train set, pashmina shawl
content: US State Department records reveal gifts exchanged between Indian officials and American leaders. Prime Minister Modi presented items like a Sterling Silver Train Set valued at $7,750 to former President Biden. Other notable gifts included a Pashmina Shawl for Jill Biden and a Shiva Nataraja Bronze Statue for Lloyd Austin, with most items transferred to the National Archives.

title: Panama court ruling delivers Trump a strategic win - and a setback for Xi
content: Panama's Supreme Court has voided a major Panama Canal ports contract held by a Chinese-linked firm, a significant win for the 'Donroe Doctrine'. This ruling aligns with US efforts to curb Chinese influence over strategic trade routes, complicating Beijing's global commercial footprint and reinforcing US leverage. The decision stems from alleged irregularities, though its geopolitical implications are profound.

title: Maharashtra cabinet rejig on cards to fill Ajit Pawar's slot; Fadnavis may take charge of finance
content: A Maharashtra cabinet reshuffle is anticipated following the tragic death of Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar. With Ajit Pawar's demise, the search for a successor to his key portfolios, including finance, is underway. Speculation suggests Dilip Walse Patil and Jayant Patil are potential contenders, with a possible NCP faction merger influencing the appointments.

title: Vonn crashes, limps off in last pre-Olympics run
content: Lindsey Vonn crashed in her final downhill before the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics on Friday and was left limping and keeping weight off her left knee.

title: One for ages: Flagg nets 49; Knueppel scores win
content: Kon Knueppel made the critical plays down the stretch, outdueling Cooper Flagg, his former roommate at Duke who led all scorers with 49 points, and helping the Hornets past the Mavericks for their fifth straight win.

title: Alcaraz outlasts Zverev in 5.5 hour epic match
content: Carlos Alcaraz overcame possible cramps and injury to fend off Alexander Zverev in an epic, momentum-swinging five-setter Friday, becoming the youngest man in the Open era to reach the finals of all four Grand Slam events.

title: Brady touts Coleman: 'Stood on the table' for WR
content: New Bills coach Joe Brady expressed his support for wide receiver Keon Coleman, stating that "Keon Coleman is going to be a Buffalo Bill."

content: Patrick Kane passed Mike Modano on Thursday night to become the highest-scoring U.S.-born player in NHL history.

content: Srinivasan retired as Deputy SP from the CISF and had been actively involved with the Usha School of Athletics, which has produced several international athletes

title: Watch: How will ‚ÄòAjit Dada‚Äôs‚Äô death change the course of Maharashtra‚Äôs political scenario?
content: What will be the decision of the Pawar family, how will Mahayuti be shaped now, what path will the senior satraps of NCP who had accepted Ajit Pawar‚Äôs leadership, take? His death has led to several unanswered questions, leaving a void in the State politics for a long time.

title: U.S. to return three ancient bronze sculptures to India
content: The sculptures are ‚ÄòShiva Nataraja‚Äô, belonging to the Chola period, circa 990; ‚ÄòSomaskanda‚Äô of the Chola period, 12th century; and ‚ÄòSaint Sundarar with Paravai‚Äô of the Vijayanagar period, 16th century

title: Ancient grain storage tradition fading fast in Srikakulam district
content: The ancestral practice known as Khoni or Paathara was once observed by farmers along the banks of the Mahendratanaya River. Several factors‚Äîincluding lack of space and awareness, as well as changes in rural architecture‚Äîhave contributed to its decline. This tradition thrived in the inland, hilly terrain, where underground grain storage was effective. Over time, however, this ancient practice has gradually faded, becoming more of a story from the past, writes T. Appala Naidu.

title: Blaze engulfs forested land at Menamkulam
content: The fire broke out around 1.30 p.m. on the land under the control of the Industries Department, close to vital installations including the Women‚Äôs Battalion and the Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd.‚Äôs LPG filling plant

title: What is the Salman Khan personality rights case? | Explained
content: The ongoing case has generated interest in the legal battle between individual personality rights, particularly in the context of celebrities, and technology companies operating AI-driven platforms in India

title: Baramati plane crash: Probe being conducted on timeline-based approach, says Union Minister
content: Responding to a query about the absence of firefighting personnel during the incident, Union Civil Aviation Minister Ram Mohan Naidu said the airstrip is used primarily by flying training organisations

title: Voters increasingly link their choices with policies, delivery
content: Data show rising women‚Äôs participation and independent decision-making in voting; majority of the voters believe that their vote has a tangible influence

title: Stray dogs at the centre of a growing social divide
content: Villages across Telangana are reporting mass killing of stray dogs with alarming regularity. As fear and frustration mount, stray dog management has turned into a flashpoint, with gram panchayats seeking swift remedies and courts weighing empathy against public safety, writes¬†Swathi Vadlamudi

title: Governor inaugurates 108-foot national flag at Mehdipatnam Garrison
content: The programme included a guard of honour, hoisting of the Tricolour and the rendition of the national anthem

title: Solving Bengaluru‚Äôs parking puzzle
content: While paid parking is being introduced on more stretches and towing is set to make a comeback, Chetan B.C. explores if these measures are enough to solve Bengaluru‚Äôs traffic maze

title: PRIYA trial links teen B12 intake to long-term health in babies
content: Vitamin B12 could be a ‚Äòregulator of regulators‚Äô that controls enzymes involved in gene expression; based on the finding, experts said the national policy should include vitamin B12 supplements to improve the nutritional status of adolescents and women of reproductive age

title: Colleges within schools
content: From just a couple of government colleges in 1966, the year Haryana was formed, the State now has 186. The policy of every school graduate having access to a college within 20 km propelled Haryana into number-driven growth over the past five years. On ground though, Ashok Kumar finds that many colleges are run from school buildings, there are few courses on offer, and an acute shortage of teaching staff leaves students at a disadvantage

title: Guwahati Refinery solely supplied smokeless fuel to Indian Army during Ops Sindoor: Official
content: ‚ÄúThis is a matter of pride that Guwahati Refinery played an important role during the country‚Äôs defence mechanism in Operation Sindoor,‚Äù the Guwahati Refinery (GR) executive director said

title: IAF drops 12,000 litres of water to battle forest fires in Arunachal Pradesh‚Äôs Lohit Valley
content: In an X post, the IAF stated that a dedicated team of Air Warriors was deployed at the urgent request of civic authorities following a plane crash at Baramati Airport

title: NHRC issues notice to Rajasthan government over burial rights demand by Kalbelia community
content: The notice was issued over protests by the Kalbelia community, demanding a designated place for burial of their kin in Barmer district

title: Suvendu Adhikari visits fire affected warehouse, says many are still missing
content: The Leader of Opposition said that when he reached the area, he found that Section 163(2) BNSS was issued, banning the Assembly of five or more persons within a 100-metre radius of the incident site

title: Bihar Cabinet approves additional financial assistance to beneficiaries of Mukhyamantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
content: In order to streamline and regulate the government employees with regard to the use of social media, the State Cabinet approved the Government Servants‚Äô Conduct (Amendment) Rules, 2026 which will be implemented across the entire state

title: Meghalaya police probe ISIS-linked poster asking tribals to leave
content: The Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisations petitioned Prime Minister Narendra Modi, calling the threat a serious national security concern

title: Manipur aims to resettle 40,000 IDPs by March
content: The State government has released ‚Çπ124 crore toward rehabilitating 3,700 families to date, an official statement said

title: In Bihar, farmers‚Äô registration work will be carried out from February 2 to 6
content: Goal to Quickly Enter the Second Phase of ‚ÄòAgriStack‚Äô in the Interest of Farmers. Farmers will receive free services at Common Service Centers (CSC); no fees will be charged

title: SIR in Gujarat: 6.88 lakh seek inclusion, 9.88 lakh deletion in electoral rolls
content: Officials said the final decision on additions and deletions will be taken after verification of the applications and supporting documents

title: Jammu and Kashmir CM raises Kashmir shawl seller‚Äôs thrashing issue with Uttarakhand CM; Police lodge FIR, says JKSA
content: The FIR has been registered against Sanjay Yadav and one other individual under Sections 117(2) and 352 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS)

title: Madras High Court questions T.N. government for not setting up heritage commission
content: High Court orders the publication of a notification in leading dailies, calling for applications for the post of chairman of the commission

title: Kerala Budget 2026-27: A statement of fiscal resilience in a volatile federal framework
content: The Budget presented by State Finance Minister K.N. Balagopal serves as a blueprint for navigating global disorder and domestic fiscal challenges. It prioritises revenue-led fiscal consolidation, prudent debt management, inclusive welfare, and innovative investments

title: Tamil Nadu State Film Awards for 2016-2022 announced: actors Suriya, Dhanush, Nayanthara and more bag top honours
content: The awards will be handed out to the winners on February 13, 2026, at the Kalaivanar Arangam in Chennai.

title: Heavy security arrangements in Thiruvananthapuram ahead of India-New Zealand T20I match
content: As per the security protocol, the stadium and its surrounding areas have been declared a temporary ‚ÄòRed Zone‚Äô on January 30 and 31

title: Security forces intensify anti-terror op in J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar; internet services remain suspended

title: Smells like separatism: Oil-rich Alberta slipping from Canada to America?
content: a growing separatist movement in the country‚Äôs oil-rich province of Alberta has ignited a full-blown diplomatic spat with Washington . leaders of the Alberta Prosperity Project (APP) have held a series of high-level meetings with officials in Washington to discuss breaking away from Canada . APP representatives are reported to have met US State Department officials at least three times in recent months .

title: Kremlin Confirms Trump's "Personal Request" To Halt Kyiv Strikes Till Feb 1
content: US President Donald Trump asked Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to halt strikes on Kyiv for a week "until February 1", the Kremlin said Friday, without mentioning when the request was made.

title: Why The Wests Pivot To Beijing Is No Fix For Trumps Trade War
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer's visit to China is the latest win Beijing can tout in its rivalry with Washington, but the deals he brings back to London also show the limits of the balancing act that middle powers may try to play.

title: What Challenges Await New US Fed Chair As Trump Set To Announce Pick Soon
content: Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell's successor could be named as soon as next week, President Donald Trump said Thursday, setting the stage for a major shift in the US central bank's leadership.

title: Madhya Pradesh School Principal Suspended After Food Served on Torn Pages
content: An acting principal of a government-run school in Madhya Pradesh's Maihar district was suspended on Friday for negligence after students were allegedly served food on sheets of paper from old notebooks, an official said.

title: Who Was Sadhvi Prem Baisa: Unanswered Questions Behind Her Death
content: Clad in saffron and buried in a sitting position as per Nath traditions, a small village in western Rajasthan, Pareu, bid farewell to Sadhvi Prem Baisa.

title: "Propaganda": YSRCP Attacks TDP After 'Clean Chit' In Tirupati Laddoo Row
content: The YSRCP has attacked the ruling TDP in Andhra Pradesh, accusing it of spreading "political propaganda" regarding animal fat in the Tirupati laddoo when the Jagan Reddy government was in power, and hurting Hindu sentiments.

title: Kuwait-Delhi IndiGo Flight Diverted To Ahmedabad Following Bomb Threat
content: An IndiGo flight operating from Kuwait to Delhi was diverted to the Ahmedabad airport on Friday morning after a bomb threat was reported on board, officials at the airport said.

title: Amid Rising Iran Tensions, US Navy Destroyer Docks At Israeli Port: Report
content: A US Navy destroyer has docked at the Israeli port of Eilat, Israel's Ynet news website reported on Friday, citing the military, as tensions between Washington and Iran escalate.

title: Anti-Terror Operation Intensified In J&K's Kishtwar, Mobile Internet Suspended
content: Security forces on Friday intensified their ongoing anti-terror operation in the snowbound Chatroo belt to track down and neutralise a group of three holed up Jaish-e-Mohammad terrorists in Kishtwar district of Jammu and Kashmir.

title: 'I Fear No One': Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Vows Land Mafia Crackdown
content: Bihar Deputy Chief Minister and Minister of Revenue and Land Reforms, Vijay Kumar Sinha, has intensified his campaign against the land mafia and corruption within the department, making it clear that he will not bow to pressure or threats.

title: BJP Tries Very Hard, Doesn't Get Tamil Nadu: Karti Chidambaram To NDTV
content: The Congress adds a secular sheen to the DMK-led alliance, said Congress MP Karti Chidambaram, admitting that the party is not in any position to face elections alone in Tamil Nadu.

title: Guwahati Refinery Supplied Smokeless Fuel To Indian Army During Op Sindoor
content: The Guwahati Refinery, owned by Indian Oil Corporation said it exclusively supplied 19 thousand metric tonnes of smokeless fuel to Indian armed forces during Operation Sindoor.

title: A Last-Minute Nuclear Deal Stands Between US, Russia For New Arms Race
content: The United States and Russia could embark on an unrestrained nuclear arms race for the first time since the Cold War, unless they reach an eleventh-hour deal before their last remaining arms control treaty expires in less than a week.

title: Ban Advertising Of Ultra-Processed Foods From 6 Am-11 Pm: Economic Survey
content: Raising concerns on the growing consumption of ultra-processed foods containing high fat, salt and sugar amid India becoming one of the fastest growing markets for such items in the world, the Economic Survey has pitched for a ban on their ads.

title: Hyderabad Man Donates Gold Ornaments Worth Rs 23 Takh To Goddess Padmavathi
content: A devotee from Hyderabad donated a pair of precious stone-studded gold ear ornaments weighing 178 grams, worth about Rs 23 lakh, to Goddess Padmavathi at Tiruchanur.

title: My Stand Not Pro-BJP, But Pro-Government On Some Issues: Shashi Tharoor
content: Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor on Friday said his stand on certain issues may have been seen as pro-BJP by the media, but he has only seen it as pro-government or pro-India.

title: Trump Is Now Threatening Tariffs On Nations Selling Oil To Cuba. Here's Why
content: US President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday threatening to impose additional tariffs on countries that sell oil to Cuba, further increasing pressure on the communist-led island.

title: Barmer Collector Withdraws Republic Day Award After Lawmaker Flags Deepfake Case
content: The Barmer district administration has withdrawn the Republic Day honour given to Dinesh Manju, the main accused in a deepfake video case involving Bayana MLA Ritu Banawat.

title: World Health Body Monitoring Nipah Cases In India, Rules Out Travel Curbs
content: The risk of transmission of Nipah virus remains low, and there is no need for any travel or trade restrictions, said the World Health Organisation, noting that it is closely monitoring the deadly virus cases in India.

title: Mumbai Taxi Driver Charges US Woman Rs 18,000 For 400-Metre Ride
content: Mumbai Police arrested a taxi driver for allegedly cheating an American woman by charging her Rs 18,000 for a taxi ride of just 400 metres near the Mumbai International Airport.

title: 'Disrespected northeast by not wearing gamosa': Shah blasts Rahul in poll-bound Assam
content:
NEW DELHI: Union home minister in a public address in Assam's Dibrugarh launched scathing attacks at Congress and Rahul Gandhi. Accusing the LoP of disrespecting the state's culture, the home minister blamed him for the violence and chaos in Assam. Addressing the public rally in poll-bound Assam, Shah said, "Rahul Gandhi (was the) only person during the President's At Home event to not wear Assam's gamosa... I want to ask Congress, Rahul Gandhi did not wear Assam's gamosa. Everyone present at the President's house, including the international guests, wore it. What enmity does Rahul Gandhi have with the northeast? BJP won't allow insult of region's culture. "

Gamosa Controversy Explained: BJP Criticizes Rahul Gandhi At President‚ÄôS ‚ÄòAt Home‚Äô Event

title: Our experts' favorite Super Bowl prop plays
content: there are seemingly endless ways to bet super Bowl LX . from the typical on-field stats to the off-field entertainment, there is also value to be found in the matchup between the Seattle Seahawks and the new England Patriots .

title: Updated NBA Power Rankings: This might be the week...
content: a week from the 2026 trade deadline, the market remains relatively quiet up to this point . there have been major developments across both conferences as we narrow the second half of the regular season . the Cleveland Cavaliers are climbing the conference standings, riding a four-game winning streak .

title: The Premier League stars who could still move this...
content: there is just under a week to go in the transfer window, so the clock is ticking for premier league clubs and players to make their moves . there are a number of players out there who still need to move before the window shuts on febr. 2 . if they've been ostracized from their club, asked for a move, got tangled up in difficult contractual circumstances, or simply need minutes ahead of the 2026 world cup, here are the major names in the premier league .

title: Blakeney goes from an NBA player to alleged game fixer
content: federal law enforcement unsealed criminal charges alleging Blakeney was one of the ringleaders in a u.s. college basketball gambling and game-fixing scandal involving 26 defendants . the indictment alleges Blakeney convinced NCAA players that his other co-conspirators would pay $10,000 to $32,000 in exchange for poor performances, sitting out of or removing themselves from games, and providing information about players' health .

title: Key stats and info to know before the 2026 Royal R...
content: royal Rumble, the third-longest-running annual WWE premium live event, returns on Saturday ( 2 p.m. ET, ESPN Unlimited . the event will feature a men's and women's Royal Rumble match, with the winners earning an opportunity to challenge for a world championship at WrestleMania 42 in April .

title: Sources: Cunningham set to become Falcons' GM
content: the Atlanta Falcons hired former assistant general manager Ian Cunningham as their new GM . the 40-year-old joins president of football Matt Ryan and coach Kevin Stefanski . "his vision for our team aligned exactly with the type of leader we were seeking to help take the Falcons to the next level," Ryan says .

title: Eagles hire Packers QB coach Mannion as OC
content: the Eagles are hiring Sean Mannion as their offensive coordinator . the 33-year-old has coached for just two years, breaking in as an offensive assistant for the Green Bay Packers in 2024 . he was promoted to quarterbacks coach this past season .

title: Power Rankings: Illinois is knocking on the door o...
content: the Fighting Illini beat Purdue 88-82 on saturday . they now have the highest offensive rating in the history of KenPom . the Illini have won nine games in a row dating back to mid-December .
